description:
With up to 75 lumens, this little light will help keep you seen, day or night. The KTV Pro uses 2 powerful red LEDs and a custom engineered reflector to provides over 270° of visibility. Five different modes have you covered, from a low steady on, all the way to a powerful daytime flash. Easy USB-charging comes via an integrated plug, simply pop off the rear cover and plug your light right into any standard USB port and you’re charging, no cable needed. The tool free mount fits round seat posts or aero posts, letting you swap the light between your trusty commuter and your race-bred steed.

  • 5 lighting modes, 2 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 20 lumens (4h), 3 lumens (18h), flash 1–25 lumens (8.75h), flash 2–10 lumens (19.5h) and day flash–75 lumens (10h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Wide-angle lens that provides over 270° of visibility
  • Aero post compatible mount
  • Integrated USB plug means you don’t need to carry a charging cable – full charging takes ~3 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne KTV Pro Drive Light
